column4: can you post your xorg.. it probably is not seeing your monitor type and v/h sync rates
Do you have a link to your monitor and the h/v sync rates.. I assume wide screen for the 1400x900
Need spectrum for both h/v  35-81 etc
my xorg.conf paste is at http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/32371/
add a 1440x9000 but without forcing the sync rates...
I dont see anything about your video card in there...
I assume you checked and it will do 1440x900
How do I not force refresh rate?
I had an issue with 1440 where the desktop was 1/2" bigger than the display and would scroll when I hit the top or bottom..  dropped it back a notch and works fine
Kust add another next to the -70  -60 you have there now
catch u later thanks for the help i hope i see u monday. bye
